annotations:

good day,
re mv tai star / itiro
pls advise owners interest for period 4/6 or 5/7 ww. can she do goa?
best regards
sergey ratushnyak
_______________________________________________________________________
From: Trinity-Ship Brokers <dry@trinity-ship.com>

Dear Sir / Atish
Greetings of the Day !!
CLOSE & DIRECT //
MV DIAMOND HARBOUR 33,376MT BLT 2008 OPEN SAMALAJU 29 AUG 2024
MV BROADGATE 37,949MT BLT 2017 OPEN SAMALAJU 28 AUG 2024
MV TAI STAR 62,487MT BLT 2016 OPEN ZHANGZHOU 27/28 AUG 2024
NAME: M/V DIAMOND HARBOUR
TYPE: SINGLE DECK SEMI-BOX LOG/BULK CARRIER CLASS: DNV GL
BUILT: 2008 JIANGMEN NANYANG, CHINA
FLAG: HONG KONG
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 33,376MT/10.17M/46.10MT
LOA/BEAM: 179.9M/28.40M
GRT/NRT: 20,987 / 11,521
HO/HA: 5/5
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 42565.1/ 40558.3
GEARS: 4 SETS X 30.5MT DECK CRANE.
SPEED/CONS: ON EVEN KEEL UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT SCALE 4 DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MAX. WAVE/SWELL HEIGHT 1.25M) WITH NO SWELL AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT:
LADEN - ABOUT 14.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 25.0MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 25.0MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED WOG
LADEN - ABOUT 11.6KNOTS ON ABOUT 16.9MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 12.1KNOTS ON ABOUT 16.9MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 2.9MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 5.7MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
“ABOUT” IS DEFINED AS 5% MORE ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION AND 0.5 KNOTS LESS ON VESSEL’S SPEED.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
IFO SPECS: RMG380 ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.5% SULPHUR M/M
MGO SPECS: DMA ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.1% SULPHUR M/M
VSL HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO FOR MANEUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/LEAVING AND IN PORTS AND IN ADVERSE AND/OR COLD WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD IS LOWER THAN 50 PCT IN PORT IDLE. VSL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO IN THE GENERATORS/AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.
NAME: M/V BROADGATE
TYPE: GEARED SINGLEDECK BULKCARRIER
CLASS: LRS
BUILT: 2017, IMABARI SHIPYARD, JAPAN
FLAG: LIBERIAN
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 37,949MT / 10.54M / 48.6MT
LOA/BEAM: 179.97M / 29.80M
GRT/NRT: 23,225 / 12,101
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 46,994.86 / 45,238.33
HO/HA: 5/5
GEARS:  4SETS X 30.5MT DECK CRANE BASIS HOOK MODE
SPEED/CONS: BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS, MINIMUM GOODWEATHER PERIOD TO COUNT FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CP IS 24 HOURS OF UPTO BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MAXIMUM WAVE HEIGHT 1.25 M) WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS/SWELL , ALSO BASIS NO BOTTOM FOULING DUE TO IMMOBILISATION FOR TOTAL OF 25 OR MORE DAYS IN OR OFF PORT/S AND/OR ANCHORAGE/S.
LADEN - ABOUT 14.4KNOTS ON ABOUT 24.5MT VLSFO PLUS ABOUT 0.10MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 15.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 24.5MT VLSFO PLUS ABOUT 0.10MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED (FOR GUIDANCE ONLY WITHOUT GUARANTEE)
LADEN - ABOUT 11.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 14.5MTS VLSFO PLUS ABOUT 0.10MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 12.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 14.5MTS VLSFO PLUS ABOUT 0.10MT LSMGO
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 2.0MT VLSFO PLUS ABOUT 0.10MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 4.0MT VLSFO PLUS ABOUT 0.10MT LSMGO
'ABOUT'' SHALL MEAN AN ALLOWANCE OF PLUS/MINUS 0.5 K FOR SPEED AND PLUS/MINUS 5 PERCENT FOR BUNKER CONSUMPTIONS.
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
BUNKER SPECIFICATIONS:
IFO 380 CST RMG 380
MGO DMA, CONFORMING TO ISO 8217 AND APPLICABLE SULPHUR CONTENT.
VESSEL TO HAVE THE LIBERTY OF CONSUMING ADDITIONAL IFO/MGO IN MAIN ENGINE
WHEN MANOEUVRING AND WHEN ENTERING/LEAVING PORT AND IN BAD WEATHER, IN
RESTRICTED WATERS OR IN RESTRICTED VISIBILITY AND WHEN STARTING AUXILIARY
ENGINES ALSO OF CONSUMING ADDITIONAL IFO/MGO DURING EXTREME WEATHER
CONDITIONS OR WORKING/BUNKERING AT ANCHORAGE OR EXCHANGING OR TREATING
BALLAST AND WHEN FLUSHING LINES/ENGINE WHEN CHANGING FROM USING ONE LSIFO BUNKER TANK TO ANOTHER LSIFO BUNKER TANK.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.
NAME: M/V TAI STAR
TYPE: SUPRAMAX SINGLE DECK BULK CARRIER WITH CARGO GEAR
CLASS: BV
BUILT: 21ST OCTOBER 2016, OSHIMA
FLAG: PANAMA
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 62,487MT / 13.359M / 60.43MT
LOA/BEAM: 199.98M / 32.26M
GRT/NRT: 35,318 / 20,706
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 79,052 / 77,053
M/E: MITSUI MAN B&W 6S50ME-B9.5 X 1
HO/HA: 5 / 5
GEARS: 4X30 MT DECK CRANES PLUS 4X12 CUM GRABS ON BOARD
SPEED/CONS: BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS OF UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND UP TO BOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND UP TO 2M ROLLING SWELL WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS.
FAVOURABLE CURRENTS ARE NOT TO BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT.
THE SPEED/CONSUMPTION GUARANTEE FOR BALLAST SHALL EXCLUDE HEAVY BALLAST CONDITION.
LADEN - ABOUT 13.8KNOTS ON ABOUT 26.3MT VLSFO PER DAY + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO PER DAY
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.6KNOTS ON ABOUT 26.3MT VLSFO PER DAY + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO PER DAY
ECO SPEED
LADEN - ABOUT 12.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 18.3MT VLSFO PER DAY + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO PER DAY
BALLAST - ABOUT 13.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 18.5MT VLSFO PER DAY + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO PER DAY
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 3.1MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 6.8MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.2MT LSMGO
ALLOWING BOTH 0.5 KTS SPEED AND 5% CONSUMPTION FOR THE TERM "ABOUT".
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
IFO SPECS: RMG380 ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.5% SULPHUR M/M
MGO SPECS: DMA ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.1% SULPHUR M/M
EXTRA IFO AND/OR MDO ARE ALLOWED TO USE AT CHIEF ENGINEER’S DISCRETION UNDER
THE FOLLOWING:
1) DURING RUNNING IN PERIOD AS PER INSTRUCTION MANUALS.
2) WHEN MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW OR NARROW WATER, CANAL, RIVER, IN AND OUT OF PORT, SHIFTING BETWEEN BERTHS/ANCHORAGES;
3) MAIN GENERATOR TO START/STOP, OIL CHANGE OR OVER USE;
4) FLUSHING M/E FUEL LINE WHEN VESSEL IN PORT FOR A LONG TIME;
5) EXTRA GENERATOR TO BE USED WITH MDO FOR HOLD CLEANING, OR PUMP IN/OUT OF BALLAST WATER.
A60 FIRE-INSULATED BULKHEAD FOR NO.5 CARGO HOLD.
FIXED CO2 FIRE EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM FOR CARGO HOLDS.
NO ICE CLASS, NO ICE STRENGTHENED.
BALLAST WATER TREATMENT SYSTEM, BWTS
BRAND: TECHCROSS (USCG APPROVED)
TYPE: ELECTROLYSIS
DEBALLASTING SPEED: 1,900 (METRIC TONS PER HOUR)
LIMITATION: INOPERABLE IN BRACKISH / FRESH WATER AREA(S)
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.
Best regards
Ravindra Porwal
